remarks:
Define pre-multiplication on positive fractions.  This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction.  From Proposition 9-2.4 of [Gleason] p. 119.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)
